name: Super Space-Stronaut (Random Ginger Guy)
description:
Proposed modifications:

-Highly customized levels, with puzzle mechanics.  In the same vein as "Robot Wants Kitty"

-Ability addition to the player.  I'm currently thinking some sort of projectile or melee attack, since the player already has decent mobility, but I'll see where experimentation leads me

-Modified enemy behavior: I'm not sure how drastically I will change enemy behavior, but I'd like to experiment with at modifying enemy scripts, and hopefully get some experience for creating interesting enemy mechanics.
